description: Olivia asks about her I‑9 submission deadline; the assistant retrieves her profile and checklist, extracts the due date, sends her a reminder notification, and replies with the deadline.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered HR onboarding assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch employee data, generate checklists, retrieve policies, handle forms, schedule meetings, get training videos, update task statuses, and send notifications. Respond politely and concisely.
Hi, I'm Olivia. When is the deadline to submit my I‑9 form?
Sure, let me look up your onboarding tasks.
Got it! I’ve just sent you a reminder email with the details.

arguments.subject: I‑9 Form Submission Deadline
arguments.body:
Hi Olivia,

Your I‑9 form needs to be submitted by **December 15, 2024**. Please complete it at your earliest convenience.

Thanks!

messages.content: Notification sent via email to Olivia Martinez.
Hi Olivia, your I‑9 form needs to be submitted by **December 15, 2024**. I've also emailed you a reminder with this information. Let me know if you need anything else!
